website_summaries.verdict: A popular gel eyeliner that needs a few attempts to get the perfect line.
pros: This gel eyeliner is known for its laser-like precision in drawing cat’s eye lines or razor-sharp flicks
It can last up to 12 hours
Doesn’t sit in creases or skin lines
Liquid formula is ideal for those who like to experiment with a variety of looks
cons: For a solid black line, you need to go over the line you want to make a few times to get the color density you desire

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite brand!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite gel eyeliner. I've been wearing it for years. The container looks small but the eyeliner lasts a long time. One container will last me anywhere from 6 months to a year, depending on how often I wear it and and how much I put on. I do wear it at least five times a week and wear my eyeliner on the heavier side. It comes with a small brush that makes it incredibly easy to apply. I will never go back to pencils or liquid liner.
customer_reviews.author: Nina L

customer_reviews.title: Items not fresh
customer_reviews.text: I received two gel eyeliners but they don’t look fresh. They don’t have a creamy gel consistency. The consistency is more solid and hard to use. I have used BB products for more than five years so I know this was old. The eyeliner that I already owned for eight months looks newer than this. Buy from BB
customer_reviews.author: John McCann

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS!! It's exactly what I've been looking for! I have bought other high-end liner pencils and after using this I almost can't stand the pencils now. Not only that but this is a killer price for what you get. The two with the brush for Bobbi Brown is unheard of. It will last forever and it doesn't transfer when I use it underneath my upper lash line (especially once it sets), nor does it smudge once it's set. Honestly, this is huge for me. I didn't think I'd love it as much as I do but it's seriously a game changer for me that I had to write this review.
customer_reviews.author: John Carter

customer_reviews.title: New fan
customer_reviews.text: Never used Bobbi brown before, but will definitely buy again. Brush took some getting used to, and it’s not easy to consistently apply a thin line. I might look into a different brush. But definitely smudge and water proof!
customer_reviews.author: mommaof2

customer_reviews.title: Authentic-Allergy Free
customer_reviews.text: I received authentic unopened product. This duo set is the perfect size. I have severe allergies to most eye makeup and this is the only product that I can wear and not have a reaction.
customer_reviews.author: Harper

customer_reviews.title: GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for two colors. I use it for tight-lining, not traditional lining, so I can't speak to that. I use a tight-lining brush, poke it into the pot, draw a bit on my hand to get rid of the excess, and push it into my upper lash line. Stays all day, and doesn't end up anywhere! If it doesn't dry out, it will last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sunseri

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Color is Sepia Ink, NOT ESPRESSO. Product description here was inadequate and the first QA response was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Drake's mom

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Liner Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This eye liner is the best I have ever tried and is now the only one I use. It goes on smoothly, dries nicely, and doesn't run.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Penguin

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: My eyes tear and water a lot. And they are sensitive. This is the only eyeliner that stays put and works for me, and I’ve tried a LOT. It’s also no problem to wash off at night.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Fake Bobbi Brown product
customer_reviews.text: This item does not appear to be manufactured by Bobbi Brown. I compared packaging to actual product and labels differ. Checked out more info on spotting fraudulent Bobbi Brown products and I am afraid this is not manufactured by them!!
customer_reviews.author: crrjj5

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I've used the black gel liner for years. I have dark circles and I don't need eyeliner that runs. This stuff stays put. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Narvaez

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: This was a great deal but I have allergies and my eyes run and unfortunately so does the eyeliner.
customer_reviews.author: sherrell Landrum

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I gave the black one to my mom and I kept the sepia one. It was very easy to apply. I used a small thin brush and it turned out really nice. The colors are good for a natural look but you can probably also go for something more dramatic. I have hooded eyes so I keep my line small. Even so, most liners transfer to the top. Not this one. I am pleased with this purchase for now.
customer_reviews.author: Noonefamous

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not any longer lasting than others for half the price. Disappointed in Bobbi Brown quality on this item
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product review from Well Cosmetics
customer_reviews.text: it was all dried up when I received it. I talked to people at Bobbi Brown and they told me it should have been creamy. This eye liner came from somewhere other than the United States and when I received it the caps were loose. I have a complaint into the seller and I am awaiting an answer, but it you are contemplating purchasing this product be very careful of where you purchase from. I bought from a supplier for amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Judy E. Moen

customer_reviews.title: The best and only eyeliner on the market worth buying
customer_reviews.text: The best and only eyeliner on the market worth buying!! It is worth every penny. It is all I have used for years!! Love it and once you try his eyeliner formulation you will be hooked as well!!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Powers

customer_reviews.title: The best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Finally an eyeliner that's precise and stays on!! Get a good angled brush, goes on smooth!! Will reorder!! Love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: The brown color is lighter than I thought. The black color is the same quality as my previous purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Nice eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Like Bobby brown and the little brush that it comes with make it easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: aliciajune88

customer_reviews.title: Buy L’Oréal
customer_reviews.text: No better than L’Oréal brand and more expensive save your money unless you are stuck on brand names
customer_reviews.author: D A S

customer_reviews.title: Love the product
customer_reviews.text: This is a super sweet deal if you love and use this! The seller was super nice and it got here fast. F.Y.I----It's not very clear on here, but you receive 1 brown and 1 black colored container. I love this stuff, it's a little pricey, but will last you SO long and it's GREAT quality!
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love my eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my eyeliner!! It last majority of the day for me without smudging! The best eyeliner yet!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: THE COLORS WERE AS SHOWN AND WERE CREAMY AND FRESH. THEY WERE FULL SIZE. I ALREADY HAVE THE BOBBI BROWN ANGLED EYE LINER BRUSH WHICH PUTS ON A THIN LINE AND IS A LITTLE STIFFER.
customer_reviews.author: Ann R Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not as good!
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as when I buy it from Bobbi Brown website.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Sobczak

customer_reviews.title: Smeared everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Wanna look like Alice Cooper? No? Then stick to $5 Revlon. This is overpriced trash. Within 2 hours I had to wash my face bc it looked so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna F.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. This is rated high in all the magazines
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. This is rated high in all the magazines. It tends to smear as the day goes on. Over priced. L'Oréal's version does not smear and is only nine dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Foehner

customer_reviews.title: I've always loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved this product. Unfortunately, one of the pots I received was already used! I opened it months after it was delivered, so I didn't return it. The product is great, I've used these for years, unfortunately the one I received was already used.
customer_reviews.author: Vg444

customer_reviews.title: Not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This is not long lasting. It only lasts about 4 hours, smudges easily. I expected more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Spence

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is expensive and gets dry in the jar after it has been used awhile. But, I haven't found a better product for under the eyelashes lining.
customer_reviews.author: Mae Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Came in neat condition and it's not dry
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Bobbi Brown gel eyeliner for a long time and wow I have to say, I actually like the duo that comes with the little brush. The price isn't bad either. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: I didn't receive what I ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I ordered Black Ink and Sepia Ink and I received 2 Black Ink. 😖
customer_reviews.author: CandyH

customer_reviews.title: Luxury product. Great value as I use it for months!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the feel and the clarity of color. It does smear in the heat...
customer_reviews.author: Lara Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Misleading
customer_reviews.text: The product is good, but what is featured in the photo is 2 colors. Brown (which is what I wanted) and black. I received 2 black ink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, doesn't smudge as easy as other gel eyelineers
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Doesn't smear easily, long lasting, worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Quality, includes brush. I wear daily.
customer_reviews.text: I used gel liner under eye accent. Nice having 2 color choices. Packaged so won't dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R Olson

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Always love this Eyeliner. Stays on such a long time
customer_reviews.author: Bethany Wunder

customer_reviews.title: Using this every day now as part of my makeup ...
customer_reviews.text: Using this every day now as part of my makeup routine! Sometimes wears off a bit after an entire day, but it doesn't bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeliner and love the little brush! Bobbi brown eyeliner lasts all day, in heat, humidity... all day!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby and Diane

customer_reviews.title: Description and box illustrations didn’t math contents.
customer_reviews.text: The description and the box showed pictures of one “black ink “ and one “sepia ink” but the box contained two “black ink” containers.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara C. Boyd

customer_reviews.title: When I received this product I was giving it as ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received this product I was giving it as a gift and BOTH jars were empty and used !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great waterproof eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyeliner. It’s easy to apply and it stays on all day until you remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy for Bobbie Brown
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Good value as opposed to buying in a store
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Bobby Brown gel eyeliner, very like it
customer_reviews.text: I liked this gel eyeliner, stay longer end waterproof I always used , I very like it,
customer_reviews.author: Bolormaa

customer_reviews.title: Great eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for me! It goes on well AND stays on!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gosse

customer_reviews.title: Best eye liner!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing price for this product. I usually pay this for sample size!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryllynn Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love both colors and they aren’t dried out. I was afraid they would be from reading other reviews but they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this gel liner. I have used it for years and this was an awesome deal.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Deeken

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This liner flakes off during application. Maybe the one I received was old?
customer_reviews.author: Northshore Girl

customer_reviews.title: Bobbi Brown Long wear gel eyeliner ste
customer_reviews.text: not so long wearing as I expected. I would not recommend this product to anyone, it is overpriced and smears quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Expected more
customer_reviews.text: Frankly speaking I expected more from this eyeliner, but finally I realise that it's not so longlasting and so perfect, nevertherless in general it's a good product and I'd recommend it (without idolizing it!!).
customer_reviews.author: Aguona

customer_reviews.title: this is easy to usex lasts
customer_reviews.text: Had clinique n mac, this is easy to usex lasts
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Bobbi Brown
customer_reviews.text: I just got my order today and it came in the real packagig its looks great just one lil deetail that it said in the box black ink. an sepia ink but inside the closed box i only got blackk both of themm other than that they are great i recomend it
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly bad
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this product after reading great reviews. Unfortunately I did not have the same experience as others. The product applied fine, nothing special but it did not have that much color. When I put on black eyeliner I expect it to look black. But what my real problem with the product is that it had no staying power. An hour after applying it I looked like I did not have eye liner on. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: E. Flores

customer_reviews.title: sha
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye liner I have ever had. It is very much worth the money...You will be very satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: GrammaSha

customer_reviews.title: worst eyeliner!
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money as I did!! I put this eyeliner on in the morning, around 7 am, and by 8 am it was already running. It definitely is a mistake to have called this "long-wearing".
customer_reviews.author: Novel Experts

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy with this product. I heard good things about Bobbi Brown makeup.I used the black gel eyeliner on my eyes and the brown gel for my eye brows. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: stacey

customer_reviews.title: Best Eyeliner Ever
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite eyeliner. I use it EVERY day. And I never thought I would love gel eyeliner, I've always thought the formulations were either too slick, or too gooey. This is just right. Almost a creamy clay texture. And can I just say, where have you been all my life sepia??? I love that color. It reads black, but isn't so harsh with more natural colors, or light clothes/hair. I use them both all the time. And boy do they last a long time. I think I'll never hit bottom. Oh, an angled liner brush has been a godsend with gel eyeliner for me.
customer_reviews.author: Annibell

customer_reviews.title: The best eyeliner ever
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the easiest eyeliner i have ever used and it really does LAST. I work outside in hot humid Texas and this holds up - plus its easy to apply. Thats not a talent that came naturally to me so i appreciate ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Treadgold

customer_reviews.title: Superior Eye Liner!
customer_reviews.text: Bobbi Brown’s Eye Liner is truly the best! This duo is perfect... black for the upper lid & this soft “sepia” brown for the lower. It has a great consistency & is very professional looking. I love this product — & the price is great!
customer_reviews.author: Moriah J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Careful What you Order
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Duo kit and actually got one ink container that was mostly used up, and was missing both the eyeliner brush and the Sepia Ink. I think it was returned and Amazon just put it back in stock. I intend to ask for replacement or my money back. Scary when you think people can use this material and send it back for reuse. Yuck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: exactly as described and as all the other ones I have bought. LOVE THIS eyeliner. It does not smear or wear off during the day! best eyeliner ont he market, and I have tried a bunch including Mac.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Exactly Smudge Proof
customer_reviews.text: I Saw This Product On A YouTube Video It Was Highly Recommended For Contact Wearers It Didn't Irritate My Eyes Which I Love But Still Smudged On My Contacts Which I Didn't Like If I Didn't Wear Contacts This Product Would Be Wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda Leach

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Color is intense. Use the brush it comes with. Been wearing eyeliner for 60+ years and this stays better than most
customer_reviews.author: Bloody Mary fan

customer_reviews.title: Bobbi Brown Long Wear Gel Eyeliner Duo, 1 Count
customer_reviews.text: I paid a lot more in the store and it also included the brush.
customer_reviews.author: Rene B. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with these gel eyeliners! They last all day an the colors are just beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: lizzy nunez

customer_reviews.title: this is definitley not a liquid liner and is heavy in consistency.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the idea of it but found it to be too thick and not easy to control. also the sparkles in the brown did zero for me.
customer_reviews.author: 626Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love that the set came with black, sepia, and brush. Thought I'd have to practice with this gel, but the consistency and the little brush made it easy.
customer_reviews.author: msrichie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Bobbi Brown cosmetics....especially the terrific gel eyeliner. The duo was packed well and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mooncrossing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eyeliner stays on all day
customer_reviews.text: Perfect color eyeliner goes on smoothly and stays on all day
customer_reviews.author: RedVelvet

customer_reviews.title: Looks great when applied
customer_reviews.text: Looks great when applied. A little hard to apply in the beginning, flakes a little if brush is not completely clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality but should be used for more natural liner
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Firestone

customer_reviews.title: Do not smudge
customer_reviews.text: Do not smudge, though little pricey. Overall, it's a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the best eye liner Ever !!! It won't smudge even after swimming or HIIT ;)
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Good product! It stays on longer than most gel ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product! It stays on longer than most gel eyeliners, but it tends to fade and peel a little bit. A bit pricey, but I might purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: N Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product as it stays on much better than most eyeliners.
customer_reviews.author: adolbin

customer_reviews.title: Bst eyemake up.
customer_reviews.text: I love It's stsy on all day. I have one already. This is gift to my friend. I bought it on duty free shop first time. Then gift to one. Another person also wants.
customer_reviews.author: Mieko Azekawa

customer_reviews.title: Bobbi brown gel liner
customer_reviews.text: Great liner! Stays on til you take it off. My eyes water, and it never smudges. Color is very intense.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money, but not necessarily long-wearing
customer_reviews.text: The eyeliners and brush included in this set are worth the money. However, I have had problems keeping this eyeliner in place. I'm not sure why this is the case, but I would not say that this is long-wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the good reviews but here I am doing my own review because this stuff is nice, I think this eyeliner will cover me for the whole year or even longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kazel

customer_reviews.title: Best eyeliner
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about this eyeliner! Best of all doesn’t smudge!
customer_reviews.author: ttmck

product_meta.title: Bobbi Brown Long Wear Gel Eyeliner Duo,Black, 1 Count
product_meta.description:
Long Wear Gel Eyeliner Duo:. 2x Gel Eyeliner 3g ( #Black Ink. #Sepia Ink ). 1x Mini Ultra Fine Eye Liner Brush A gel-based. water-proof eyeliner. Offers the precision of liquid liner. Color stays true for long hours. Gives you a subtle to dramatic look. Apply with Ultra Fine Eye Liner Brush.

SET CONTAINS:
2 Gel Eyeliners: Black; Sepia; Applicator Brush
feature_bullets: Offers the precision of liquid liner
Color stays true for long hours

specifications.Manufacturer: Mainspring America, Inc. DBA Direct Cosmetics
